text: (napiye! Inta) nayavancakarkalai nir kavanikkavillaiya? Avarkal, vetattai utaiyavarkalil ulla nirakarikkum tankal cakotararkalai nokki ‘‘ninkal (unkal illattai vittu) veliyerrappattal nankalum unkalutan veliyerivituvom. Unkal visayattil (unkalukku virotamaka) nankal oruvarukkum, oru kalattilum kattuppata mattom. (Evarum) unkalai etirttu por purintal, niccayamaka nam unkalukku utavi purivom'' enru kurukinranar. Anal, niccayamaka avarkal poyyarkal enru allah catciyam kurukiran
